text:
e="preserve">Geoffrey Stephens (1 October 1934 – 24 December 2020) was an English songwriter and record producer. His single "Winchester Cathedral" won him the 1967 Grammy Award for Best Contemporary (R&R) Recording. He was born in London. Other best known singles were "Sorry Suzanne", "Daughter of Darkness" and "You Won't Find Another Fool Like Me".
Stephens died on 24 December 2020 at the age of 86.

annotations.surface_form: You Won't Find Another Fool Like Me
